question: What is the name of the Meteor that originates from 3200 Phaethon Asteroid, and is visible in Earth as a meteor shower?
explanation: Scientists have stated that the strongest meteor shower of the year – “Geminids meteor shower” would be active from December 4 to 20 this year. These meteors originate from 3200 Phaethon Asteroid and its diameter is about 5 Km. This meteor was discovered in the year 1983 and has been named after the Greek myth of Phaethon the son of Sun god Helios.
